com.unimelb.swen30006.mailroom.samples

Class SimpleSelectionStrategy

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.unimelb.swen30006.mailroom.samples.SimpleSelectionStrategy
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    SelectionStrategy

    public class SimpleSelectionStrategy
extends java.lang.Object
implements SelectionStrategy
    A very simple selection strategy that just picks the first storage box, regardless of how full it is. Will wait if there are no boxes available to deliver or if all boxes are empty.

        A method to select a next box from a given storage box summary
        Specified by:
